name: Eileen
description: Lively and prying, Eileen is Muscipula's most entertaining guest. She likes beautiful girls but has difficulty in recognizing boys' faces.

passiveSkill.name: My Best Assistance!
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Eileen provides assistance, increasing the DMG RES Rate of Leader (excluding Eileen) and allies on the same row as Eileen by {placeholder}, and Charlotte's by an additional {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: No One Leaves!
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Eileen takes a photo of all enemies, dealing {placeholder} damage to all enemies. Has a {placeholder} chance of stunning at least {placeholder} enemies for 1 round."}

specialSkill.name: The Search Is On!
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Eileen discovers a weakness, dealing {placeholder} of ATK damage to an enemy and ignoring {placeholder} of enemy's DEF.Chance to use skill:{placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Got a Clue!
normalSkill.description: Deals {placeholder} of ATK damage to an enemy.

templateData.lens4.skill: Eileen takes a photo of all enemies, dealing {placeholder} damage to all enemies. Has a {placeholder} chance of stunning at least {placeholder} enemies for 1 round.
